snippet: Japan’s defense minister said that he wants to update guidelines that govern how the two allies’ militaries would cooperate during a potential maritime clash with China.
abstract: Japan’s defense minister Satoshi Morimoto says he wants to revise his nation’s security alliance with United States to place more emphasis on the threat from China to islands at the center of territorial dispute.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s defense minister said that he wants to update guidelines that govern how the two allies’ militaries would cooperate during a potential maritime clash with China.
